item.title: Cursor: Editor con AI
item.description: https://www.cursor.com/ Aviso: Te pide crearte una cuenta. wget "https://downloads.cursor.com/production/client/linux/x64/appimage/Cursor-0.46.11-ae378be9dc2f5f1a6a1a220c6e25f9f03c8d4e19.deb.glibc2.25-x86_64.AppImage" chmod +x Cursor-0.46.11-ae378be9dc2f5f1a6a1a220c6e25f9f03c8d4e19.deb.glibc2.25-x86_64.AppImage env XDG_DATA_DIRS=/usr/share:/usr/local/share ./Cursor-0.46.11-ae378be9dc2f5f1a6a1a220c6e25f9f03c8d4e19.deb.glibc2.25-x86_64.AppImage
